== Description ==
Sets the headers to prevent caching for the different browsers. 

Different browsers support different <tt>nocache</tt> headers, so several headers must be sent so that all of them get the point that no caching should occur. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php nocache_headers() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (void) : This function does not return a value.
